com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.scenes

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.scenes.Layer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadLayer

    public abstract class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Layer within a scene.
    Author:
    jlreyes

    • Constructor Detail

      • Layer

        public Layer(java.lang.String name,
     Scene scene)

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(Loader.PercentDone percentDone)
        Called on loading.

      • createCamera

        public abstract GameCamera createCamera()
        Called during load. Clients must return a camera to use for this layer.

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Called when the application is about to be paused. We lose our context, so no need to unregister textures.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called when the application is about to be resumed. We reload every sprite's textures.

      • onUpdateStart

        public void onUpdateStart()

      • update

        public void update(long deltaTime,
          Scene.SceneState state)
        Updates the layer depending on the state and then calls the update method for each sprite in this layer. Updates this layer's camera last.

      • onUpdateFinish

        public void onUpdateFinish(java.util.ArrayList<Renderable> renderables,
                  java.lang.Thread thread)
        Called on at the end of an update.
        Parameters:
        renderables - list where we should add the renderables from this layer
        thread - The thread we will pass control to.

      • updateOnState

        public abstract void updateOnState(long deltaTime,
                 Scene.SceneState state)
        Updates this layer differently depending on the given scene state.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time passed since the last game step

      • processInput

        public Sprite processInput(android.view.MotionEvent inputEvent)
        Processes the given input event. We only attempt to check if a sprite was tapped.
        Returns:
        null if no sprite handled the event, the sprite that handled the event otherwise

      • addSprite

        public void addSprite(Sprite sprite)
        Adds the given sprite to this layer's array of sprites. O(n), should not be used dynamically.

      • addSprites

        public void addSprites(Sprite[] sprites)
        Appends the given array of sprites to this layer's array of sprites. O(n), sprite's should not be added dynamically.
        Parameters:
        sprites - Array of sprites to add

      • addSprites

        public void addSprites(java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> sprites)

      • spriteAt

        public Sprite spriteAt(float x,
              float y)
        Returns a sprite iff there is a sprite in this layer at (x, y). Returns null otherwise.

      • getCamera

        public LayerCamera getCamera()

      • setCamera

        public void setCamera(GameCamera gameCamera)

      • setCullGrid

        public void setCullGrid(CullGrid cullGrid)

      • getCullGrid

        public CullGrid getCullGrid()

      • hasCullGrid

        public boolean hasCullGrid()

      • getSprites

        public Sprite[] getSprites()

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getParentScene

        public Scene getParentScene()
